app.title: Reflecto
app.description: Write down your thoughts and get AI analysis

newEntry.title: New Entry
newEntry.description: Describe your day, thoughts or events
newEntry.contentPlaceholder: Tell about your day, thoughts, feelings...
newEntry.saveError: Failed to save note. Please try again.

voiceRecording.errorMessage: Error recognizing speech. Please try again.
voiceRecording.recognizesSpeech: Recognizes speech in the original language
voiceRecording.recommendedDuration: It is recommended to record no more than 2 minutes

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Artificial intelligence will analyze your entries
aiAnalysis.emptyState: Create your first entry to get AI analysis
aiAnalysis.generateDescription: Click the button below to analyze your entries
aiAnalysis.summaryDescription: AI-powered analysis of your daily experiences
aiAnalysis.noNotesTodayDescription: Add your first entry to get AI analysis
aiAnalysis.noNotesDescription: There are no entries for the selected date
aiAnalysis.weeklySummaryDescription: Analysis of your daily summaries for the week
aiAnalysis.dailySummaryDescription: AI analysis of your daily entries and thoughts
aiAnalysis.insufficientDailySummariesDescription: To create a weekly summary, you need to create more than 3 daily summaries for the selected week

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Analysis of your activity and diary writing patterns
analytics.loginRequired: Please log in to view analytics
analytics.totalNotesDescription: Total number of diary entries you've created in the last 30 days
analytics.avgNoteLengthDescription: Average number of characters per entry, showing your typical writing length
analytics.dailySummariesDescription: Number of AI-generated daily summaries created from your entries
analytics.weeklySummariesDescription: Number of AI-generated weekly summaries created from your daily summaries
analytics.dailyActivityDescription: Number of entries by day for the last 30 days
analytics.activityHeatmapDescription: Which days of the week you are most active
analytics.timeOfDayDescription: What time of day you write entries most often
analytics.mostActiveDayDescription: The day of the week when you write the most entries
analytics.avgEntriesPerDayDescription: Average number of entries written per day over the last 30 days
analytics.totalCharactersDescription: Total number of characters written across all your entries
analytics.completionRateDescription: Percentage of days in the last 30 days when you wrote at least one entry
analytics.currentStreakDescription: Number of consecutive days you've been writing entries
analytics.longestStreakDescription: Your longest run of consecutive days with entries
analytics.longestNoteDescription: The entry with the most characters, showing your most detailed writing
analytics.weekdayProductivityDescription: Activity by day of week in radar chart
analytics.errorMessage: Failed to load analytics data. Please try again later.
analytics.emptyStateMessage: Create some entries to see your analytics and insights.

history.description: View all entries and AI analysis
history.loginRequired: Please log in to view history
history.emptyState: Your entries will be displayed here

actions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

auth.signUpDescription: Create a new account to start your diary

auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

auth.signInToViewAnalysis: Sign in to view AI analysis of your entries

authCallbackErrors.no_auth_code: Authentication failed: No code was returned. Please try again.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.modalDescription: Help us improve by reporting bugs or suggesting new features
feedback.titlePlaceholder: Brief description of the issue or suggestion...
feedback.descriptionPlaceholder: Please provide detailed information about the bug or suggestion...
feedback.submitSuccess: Feedback sent successfully! Thank you for your input.
feedback.submitError: Failed to send feedback. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome to Reflecto! 🎉
welcome.description: Your personal AI diary that helps you better understand yourself and your thoughts. Let's explore the main features!

entries.title: Write down your thoughts ✍️
entries.description: Add entries about your day, emotions, plans, or reflections. Use voice input for quick entry creation. For example: "Today was a productive day - completed an important project and feel satisfied with the work done."

summary.title: AI analyzes your entries 🧠
summary.description: Our AI creates smart summaries: daily from your entries, weekly from daily summaries, monthly from weekly summaries, and yearly from monthly summaries. This helps you see patterns and trends in your life!

security.title: Your data is secure 🔒
security.description: All your entries and summaries are encrypted with your credentials. Data is stored encrypted in the database - only you can read it. Your privacy is our priority!

start.title: Ready to start? 🚀
start.description: Great! Now you know all the main features of Reflecto. Create your first entry and start your journey to better self-understanding!

subscriptions.features: Unlock premium features and unlimited access
subscriptions.order_canceled: Subscription canceled -- continue to browse and subscribe when you're ready.
